title: Manage a Fare Card Issue
description: A passenger reports that their registered smart card is not working at the turnstile. A customer service agent must investigate.

tasks.description: Look up the passenger's smart card account using their card number.
Review the card's recent transaction history and status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the card has a sufficient balance but is marked as 'Blocked'.

tasks.description: Investigate the reason for the block, finding it was automatically blocked due to a failed auto-reload payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the root cause of the issue.

tasks.description: Inform the passenger of the issue, help them update their payment information, and unblock the card.
tasks.expected_outcome: The passenger's card is reactivated and functional.
